  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(WindowDescriptor descriptor)
      Constructs a Game object with the specified window descriptor. Initializes the game state to "MainMenu" and sets up the window.
      Parameters:
      descriptor - The window descriptor for the game.

  • Method Details

      public Game addSystem(System system)
      Adds a system to the game.
      Parameters:
      system - The system to be added to the game.
      Returns:
      The Game instance for method chaining.

    • getTitle

      public static String getTitle()
      Gets the title of the game window.
      Returns:
      The title of the game window.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the game loop, executing each system in the process. The loop continues indefinitely until the game state is set to "Exit".
